Light + Fit

Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how Working Well (“we”, “our” or “us”) discloses information, and what choices you have with respect to the information in connection with your use of [http://www.lightandfit.com/] (the “Site”) and the associated Slack app, features and content (the “Services”).

What Does This Privacy Policy Cover?

This Privacy Policy covers the treatment of personally identifiable information gathered when you are using or accessing the Services. This Privacy Policy does not apply to the practices of third parties that we do not own or control, including but not limited to any third party websites, services and applications that you elect to access through Slack or to individuals that we do not manage or employ. While we attempt to facilitate access only to those Third Party Services that share our respect for your privacy, we cannot take responsibility for the content or privacy policies of those Third Party Services. We encourage you to carefully review the privacy policies of any Third Party Services you access.

What Information Do We Collect?

Working Well is simply here to help you incorporate wellness practices into your workday . The only data retained by Working Well is your team webhook url (which is required to post Working Well messages to your Slack). This information is the only information we need from Slack to make the service available to you. We do not collect any other personal information about you from Slack. Furthermore, all other data resulting from your use of Slack is not visible to us, such as all your messages in your chats and channels. Third party providers: Working Well does not display advertising and does not pass on any data to advertisers or other providers with commercial interests. No data will be passed on to third parties for any other purpose than the functional provision of the service itself. For the functional provision of the service we work together with the developer Working Well to build and maintain the app. The developer does not collect any data, just ensures the app functions properly. Email, Text, and Push Notification Communications: We may communicate with you via push notification, to the extent you permit us to do so. Aggregate Information: We collect statistical information about how many users download the app. This statistical information is not Personal Information and cannot be tied back to you, your Account or your web browser.

How Can I Delete The App?

Should you ever decide to stop using the Slack app, you may do so through Slack, by withdrawing from the Slack channel housing the app or by deleting the app plugin.

Update of the data protection information

If necessary due to legal changes or as soon as changes in the data processing carried out by us make this necessary, we will adapt these instructions. Therefore Light + Fit asks you to inform yourself regularly about the content. As soon as the changes make it necessary for you to cooperate (e.g. consent) or any other individual notification, we will of course inform you immediately.

What If I Have Questions or Concerns?

If you have any questions or concerns regarding privacy using the Slack app, please send us a detailed message to [CUSTOMER SERVICE EMAIL]. We will make every effort to resolve your concerns.
